column4: W Maxwell St at S Upper St
column5: W Maxwell St is shutdown with traffic diverted to Upper St.  One lane open on Upper St.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
